name: Land of Kingdoms
description:
Land of Kingdoms is strategy kingdom-builder game in medieval style, where your goal is, obviously, create your own kingdom and lead it to the glory (or at least to something). For now its just small indie project with (kinda) cozy graphics and simple gameplay, but even now it has:

> Resource and economy sistem

> Abylity to create map of any size of shapes (mostly square-alike)

> Mood of people and its dynamic change

> Day/night cycle and dynamic weather

> *will be added later*

CONTROLS

W,A,S,D - camera moving

B - buildings menu

L - landscape tile select

T - guide

Esc - menu

Ctrl/Shift - boost/slowdown (camera)

Currently game is in development and don't have much to offer, but still we wish you a good and fun time playing it. There are a lot of updates coming soon!
